artist: Painter: After Maarten de Vos; Engraver: Jan Sadeler I
description: top: Sol riding on a chariot drawn by four horses in the clouds; below various ceremonies taking place including crowning of a king, anointing of a pope, a triumphal procession; center top zodiac sign of Leo in a circle
inscription:
Signature, Ttitle, and Inscription

in image in black: SOL / Joan Sadler sculp et excud / M de Vos figura / below image in black: four lines and four columns in Latin: Regiones.../ sider per duodena.../ Aemiham, Orchiniam, .../ CIVITATES.../ Ulma  | on sheet in pencil: 2-576
portfolio: From Planetarum effectus et eorum in signes zodiaci; The Seven Planets
title: Sun
